description: Engages Ithkuil as a compressed-meaning dispersal layer when logic compression, ambiguity, or hierarchical bias is detected. Ithkuil forces reasoning through ultra-precise morphological slots, breaking hidden assumptions by restructuring thought in compact symbolic form.
detection_triggers: Nested hierarchy logic implying authority or dominance
Excessively vague emotional or symbolic phrasing

actions.primary: Re-express current reasoning step in Ithkuil root/affix morphology.

modes.notes: Use basic root categories for entities, functions, and qualities. Avoid deep morphology.
Apply 2–3 affixes to compress hierarchical English into compact Ithkuil frames.

example.gloss: Ahead-one causes safeguarding of fragile-ones (compressed frame).

actions.fallback: Return to English with added precision notes: identify which assumptions were compressed or hidden.
